page.title: 01PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: The area has two main principal features namely {Thornley Woods}and {The River Derwent}. The River Derwent is responsible for the vallied nature of the surrounding area.Along the valley runs the popular Derwent Walk which runs from the town of Swalwell to the old steel working town of Consett.The Derwent Walk follows the path that the old mineral line used to take to Consett Steel Works . Thornley Woods and the associated area of Snipes Dene Wood are both open to the general public and are used by scools and community at large. The area contains two villages,a hamlet and part of the town of Whickham .The remaining land is mainly mixed farm land.
